mapper.select: SELECT C.RN, C.CMT_NO, C.FREE_NO, C.NICKNAME, C.CMT_CONTENT, C.CREATE_DATE, C.MODIFY_DATE, C.STATE, C.DEPTH, C.GROUP_NO, C.IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, CREATE_DATE ASC) AS RN, CMT_NO, FREE_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, IP FROM FREECMT WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNo}) C WHERE C.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREECMT (FREE_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, IP, GROUP_NO) VALUES (#{freeNo}, #{nickname}, #{cmtContent}, NOW(), NOW(), 1, 0, #{ip}, #{freeNo})
